code:
defmodule Solution do
  @spec count_subarrays(nums :: [integer], k :: integer) :: integer
  def count_subarrays(nums, k) do
    max_val = Enum.max(nums)
    segments = nums
               |> Enum.with_index()
               |> Enum.filter(fn {num, _} -> num == max_val end)
               |> Enum.map(fn {_, index} -> index end)
               |> Enum.chunk_by(fn x -> x end)
               |> Enum.filter(fn segment -> length(segment) >= k end)

    count = Enum.reduce(segments, 0, fn segment, acc ->
      start_pos = hd(segment) - (k - 1)
      end_pos = List.last(segment) + (k - 1)
      acc + (start_pos + 1) * (length(nums) - end_pos)
    end)

    count
  end
end
